title: A Vector Bernstein Inequality for Self-Normalized Martingales
abstract:
We prove a Bernstein inequality for vector-valued self-normalized
martingales. We first give an alternative perspective of the corresponding
sub-Gaussian bound due to Abbasi-Yadkori et al. via a PAC-Bayesian argument
with Gaussian priors. By instantiating this argument to priors drawn uniformly
over well-chosen ellipsoids, we obtain a Bernstein bound.
